origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'EnergyMarketAPI.get_realtime_prices', 'description': 'This function provides real-time prices for specified energy commodities.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'commodities', 'type': 'LIST', 'description': 'A list of energy commodities to get prices for, e.g., oil, natural_gas.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'prices', 'description': 'A dictionary mapping each commodity to its current price.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 EnergyMarketAPI.get_realtime_prices, 它的参数输入如下: 'commodities'是['oil', 'natural_gas'].
